events.text: It is I.... the Ghost of Hintstrom!!

....Never heard of that place.
What do you want? I'm trying to cover up my murder here.

*ahem* Young disciple, should you find yourself in any predicament in your quest of removing sin...
Just shout the words "[color=#f6dd3f]hanadulset[/color]" and I'll show you wonders your eyes have never perceived before!!
Uhh... basically type "[color=#f6dd3f]hanadulset[/color]" on your keyboard and it'll highlight the things you still need to find.
Oh, okay! Thanks disembodied voice I found inside the stalls.

'Tis my pleasure! I look forward on seeing what you could accomplish.
And fear not, my child. You can type the word again... and all my spirits will combust!
It'll be as if I was never there to begin with. 
Well then, tally ho!

As swift as he arrived... 
The Ghost of Hintstrom left without a trace. 
...
He got flushed down the toilet.
